Entries.12{{YearRemainder}}: Between you and I, @, I'm not sure we would have a movie theater in town at all if the building didn't just show up one day.#$b#Even as is I'm not sure how they turn a profit.
Entries.winter_Mon10: I hear Joja left %place too, because the workers at their warehouse there wanted to unionize...

Entries.12{{YearRemainder}}: With Joja here, with all the tax breaks we have to give to Joja, we get a lot less tax revenue.#$b#Makes everything so much more difficult.
Entries.13{{YearRemainder}}: Sometimes I just think of how much data Joja has on you and I, and I wonder if it was worth it.
Entries.26{{YearRemainder}}: It's really a race to the bottom, isn't it?#$b#All these little towns competing with tax breaks, trying to lure in big companies.#$b#It's a game I don't want to play anymore.$s
Entries.27{{YearRemainder}}: Joja's just so much of commerce these days, I wonder when the government'll get around to filing an antitrust suit against them.

Entries.summer_10{{YearRemainder}}: The Governor will be here tomorrow! We have to impress him.
Entries.8{{YearRemainder}}: Between you and I, @, I'm so glad a no pill mill has decided to set up shop here.

Entries.12_2: Ugh, the stock market is going insane right now, I have to keep myself from looking too much at my portfolio.#$b#I try to remind myself that buying and holding is the best strategy, but it's hard sometimes.
Entries.16_2: It's surprisingly hard to get a grant to get things repaired.#$b#Politicians like new shiny things with their names on it, upkeep isn't as...popular.$s
Entries.17_2: Maybe we should pivot our economy to focus more on tourism?
Entries.18_2: Just waiting for the new jobs report to drop...gosh, I'm hoping for good news.

Entries.12_2: One of our neighboring small towns resorted to inviting in a...let's say, undesirable industry in. Because they promised jobs.#$b#Now they're difficult to get rid of without tanking their local economy.$s
Entries.14_2: Governor's been talking to me about setting up a desalination plant here.#$b#We get plenty of rainfall, but inland, well. It's a lot drier.#$e#It's worth a bit of money if we sign up for it.
Accel is looking for a new place to for one of their campuses.#$b#They're...well, they pay well, so having one of them is definitely an economic boon.#$b#But the tax breaks they expect...
